asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Brad, looking very nervous. He is the wimpy friend, with neatly combed brown hair. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
